ch0247_90_dande/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Took you a while. I thought you’d gotten lost!
ch0247_90_dande/0101_0701_02_10: All right, have an absolute champion time today!
ch0247_90_dande/7101_0701_01_10:
You know, I only got this strong because of my
trust and friendship with Charizard!
ch0247_90_dande/7101_0701_02_10:
Believe in yourself and your Pokémon! If you trust
in one another and carry on battling side by side,
you’ll surely grow stronger!
ch0247_90_dande/7102_0701_01_10:
Awakening a new kind of power in yourself is
exciting, don’t you think?
ch0247_90_dande/7102_0701_02_10: I’m not finished having a champion time yet!
ch0247_90_dande/7102_0701_03_10:
Let’s always make sure everyone can have a
champion time!
ch0247_90_dande/7103_0701_01_10:
Charizard is always helping me out, even outside
of battle!
ch0247_90_dande/7103_0701_02_10:
He acts as a sort of guide to keep me from
getting lost.
ch0247_90_dande/7103_0701_03_10:
It’s thanks to Charizard I’m able to find my way
around town!
ch0247_90_dande/7104_0701_01_10: My Charizard is pretty popular with the fans, too!
ch0247_90_dande/7104_0701_02_10:
Whenever he comes out in battle, the crowd
goes wild!
ch0247_90_dande/7104_0701_03_10:
When you come to Galar, you should come see
me and Charizard battle! Our matches can get
pretty heated!
ch0247_90_dande/7105_0701_01_10:
Are there any Pokémon you think symbolize you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0247_90_dande/7105_0701_03_10:
Charizard is an incredible partner, and I’m not the
only one who thinks so. People are always saying
how great we are together!
ch0247_90_dande/7105_0701_04_10:
If you haven’t found a Pokémon like that yet,
I hope you do one day!
ch0247_90_dande/7105_0701_05_10: And when you do...you should battle us!
ch0247_90_dande/1701_0701_01_10:
Right, then! A gift for you from the greatest
Champion!
ch0247_90_dande/1701_0702_01_10: I’m excited to see you grow!
ch0247_90_dande/2501_0701_01_10:
It’s pretty wild that my sync stone ultimate has the
power to change my outfit!
ch0247_90_dande/2501_0701_02_10: Then after a while, it goes back to normal.
ch0247_90_dande/2501_0701_03_10:
Changing how you look for a brief time...
It’s a bit like Gigantamaxing!
ch0247_90_dande/2501_0702_01_10:
Who knows! Maybe humans will be able to get
huge someday too, kinda like Dynamaxing.
ch0247_90_dande/2501_0702_02_10: That would make battles even cooler!
ch0247_90_dande/2501_0702_03_10:
I’ve already got a catchphrase for it in mind.
“Let’s have an ULTIMATE champion time!”
ch0247_90_dande/2511_0701_01_10: My signature pose is called the Charizard pose!
ch0247_90_dande/2511_0701_02_10:
During battle, fans often do the Charizard pose
too, to show their support.
ch0247_90_dande/2511_0701_03_10:
If you come to any of my battles, give the
Charizard pose a try!
ch0247_90_dande/2511_0702_02_10:
Just channel Charizard with your whole body—
with power and style!
ch0247_90_dande/2511_0702_03_10: Well, have fun doing the Charizard pose!
ch0247_90_dande/3001_0701_01_10:
Did you sleep well last night? You’ve gotta
take care of yourself if you’re aiming to be
the strongest!
ch0247_90_dande/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m supposed to meet someone, but I got lost...
Could you help me out?
ch0247_90_dande/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh, it’s already nighttime! Charizard’s tail was
burning so bright I didn’t even notice!
